name: Thai Fresh Spring Rolls Recipe (Rice Paper Rolls)
description: Easy Thai fresh spring rolls recipe - pair with your favorite dipping sauce like peanut sauce or a spicy variant.
recipeIngredient: 2  handfuls of rice noodles (pre-soaked in water)

itemListElement.text: Spring onions: Cut them into large pieces for a refreshing crunch.
itemListElement.name: Spring onions: Cut them into large pieces for a refreshing crunch.

itemListElement.text: Coriander: Pluck the leaves to add a fresh note.
itemListElement.name: Coriander: Pluck the leaves to add a fresh note.

itemListElement.text: Carrots: Grate them for a sweet, crunchy texture.
itemListElement.name: Carrots: Grate them for a sweet, crunchy texture.

itemListElement.text: Lettuce: Chop it into thin pieces for a crisp, refreshing layer.
itemListElement.name: Lettuce: Chop it into thin pieces for a crisp, refreshing layer.

itemListElement.text: Your choice of veggies: Repeat the prep steps for any additional vegetables you'd like to include.
itemListElement.name: Your choice of veggies: Repeat the prep steps for any additional vegetables you'd like to include.

itemListElement.text: Boil water over medium heat, add the noodles and cook according to package instructions. Don't overcook.
itemListElement.name: Boil water over medium heat, add the noodles and cook according to package instructions. Don't overcook.

itemListElement.text: Once soft, drain using a colander
itemListElement.name: Once soft, drain using a colander

itemListElement.text: For a garlicky crunch, stir a few tablespoons of crispy fried garlic and its oil into the cooked noodles.
itemListElement.name: For a garlicky crunch, stir a few tablespoons of crispy fried garlic and its oil into the cooked noodles.

itemListElement.text: Prepare a large bowl with lukewarm water. Before rolling, dip a rice paper into the water until it's soft yet slightly firm for rolling.
itemListElement.name: Prepare a large bowl with lukewarm water. Before rolling, dip a rice paper into the water until it's soft yet slightly firm for rolling.

itemListElement.text: Before rolling, dip a rice paper into a bowl of lukewarm water until it's soft yet slightly firm for rolling. Place the softened rice paper on a flat surface.
itemListElement.name: Before rolling, dip a rice paper into a bowl of lukewarm water until it's soft yet slightly firm for rolling. Place the softened rice paper on a flat surface.

itemListElement.text: Add a layer of vegetables, rice noodles, and optionally protein on the rice paper. Don't overstuff.
itemListElement.name: Add a layer of vegetables, rice noodles, and optionally protein on the rice paper. Don't overstuff.

itemListElement.text: Fold the bottom part over the ingredients, tuck in the sides, and roll upwards tightly.
itemListElement.name: Fold the bottom part over the ingredients, tuck in the sides, and roll upwards tightly.

itemListElement.text: Serve with a dipping sauce like peanut sauce.
itemListElement.name: Serve with a dipping sauce like peanut sauce.

keywords: thai fresh spring rolls, thai rice paper rolls
